title: Spin 1/2 bosons etc. in a theory with Lorentz violation
abstract: An action with unconventional supersymmetry was introduced in an earlier paper. Here it is shown that this action leads to standard physics for fermions and gauge bosons at low energy, but to testable extensions of standard physics for fermions at high energy and for fundamental bosons which have not yet been observed. For example, the Lorentz-violating equation of motion for these bosons implies that they have spin 1/2.
